title: France's Macron: EU is a haven from world dangers
text:
France's Macron: EU is a haven from world dangers 5:10pm BST - 01:43 
The French President has urged Europeans to defend their model of liberal democracy in the face of rising autocratic regimes around the world. In an address to the EU Parliament in Strasbourg, Emmanuel Macron also said France was ready to increase its contribution to the EU budget, on condition that it becomes more efficient. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
